title: Inner-filter effect of nitrogen-doped carbon quantum dots–MnO2 nanotubes for smartphone-integrated dual-mode sensing of glutathione and captopril
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20093-20104
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03287J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ankita B. Kujur, Manmohan L. Satnami, Yogyata Chawre, Pinki Miri, Akash Sinha, Rekha Nagwanshi, Indrapal Karbhal, Kallol K. Ghosh, Shamsh Pervez, Manas Kanti Deb
Nitrogen-doped carbon quantum dots (N-CQDs) exhibit unique fluorescence properties and are considered one of the best candidates for the development of fluorescence-based sensors for the detection of many analytes.
